entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this evening then clearing. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023
